doc.name: AfdxSwitchAttributes
doc.description: The attributes configured per port which is mediated by a AfdxSwitch. The mediation where (which switch port) messages are going into the switch and where (which switch port) messages are going out of the switch.
doc.author: Gilles Lasnier, Based on BasiSwitch.java by Patricia Derler
doc.property: The id of the port on the switch on which incoming messages are received. This parameter defaults to the integer value 0.
The id of the port on the switch to which outgoing messages are routed to. This parameter defaults to the integer value 1.
